title: Zyxel security advisory (AV25-686)
description: On October 21, 2025, Zyxel published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: ATP  versions ZLD V4.32 to V5.40
USG FLEX  versions ZLD V4.50 to V5.40
USG FLEX 50(W)/ USG20(W)-VPN  versions ZLD V4.16 to V5.40
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
